name: Looks Good
description:
"Looks Good!" is a casual game with various art styles and gameplay including organizing, storing, arranging, puzzles and other content. Each book in the game has a theme, and players need to stack and arrange the scattered objects in the book to make them take their place to restore the correct content in the book!

A number of artists participated in the creation, and each artist is responsible for a book in the game, that is, a theme, showing each artist's unique art style and design ideas.

The game is easy and concise, and a variety of puzzle-solving solutions are hidden.

This game is very suitable for casual puzzle game fans, that is, you can experience the fun of the whole game easily and happily, and enjoy the beautiful pictures with individual art style brought by the artists.

How to organize the messy desktop? How to put the content in the picture book in its right place? How to make every frog eat the bug? How can I dye the cloth to the correct color? How is fruit cake made? After entering the game, it will be up to you to solve the puzzle and find the correct answer, and you can also enjoy a moment of relaxing and leisure game time
